mapper.insert:
insert into weixin_user_purse (id, openid, money, cote_id, create_time, modify_time, state, bind_name, bind_tel, pigowner) values
(#{itme.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itme.openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itme.money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itme.cote_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itme.create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{itme.modify_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{itme.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{itme.bind_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{itme.bind_tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), #{itme.pigowner,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update.foreach:
update weixin_user_purse
openid = #{item.openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
money = #{item.money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cote_id = #{item.cote_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{item.create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{item.modify_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{item.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bind_name = #{item.bind_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bind_tel = #{item.bind_tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pigowner = #{item.pigowner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
